title: Will Anthem Survive the Week? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.09.21
description:
Gary Whitta and Greg talk about Anthem's deadline, CD Projekt getting hacked, and so much more!

00:00:00 - Start
:: - Housekeeping
PSILY is all about Bloodborne and features IGN’s Brian Altano, GameSpot’s Tamoor Huassain, Andy, Blessing, and me!
https://youtu.be/COJY0iEP5MY
Roger has a brand new First Impressions for Little Nightmares 2:
https://youtu.be/V5imKclDFD4
Somehow, BEYOND all of that, it’s still a HUGE week at Kinda Funny
Assassin's Creed In Review: a Kinda Funny Games In Review special releases this WEDNESDAY, February 10th, at 2:30pm PT on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames as a YouTube Premiere! Barrett played EVERY AC for this last year.
Wednesday, the FCF activities begin with the first draft. Come to twitch.tv/kindafunnygames to draft OUR Football team with Snowbike Mike and Greg on Wednesday at 5:30 p.m. PT
Then, Saturday is Wild Aces Game Day -- the Fan Controlled Football season starts with the Wild Aces squaring off against Quavo and Richard Sherman’s Glacier Boyz. We’ll be streaming the game at 5 p.m. PT on Saturday.
AFTER the game, stick around for Love, Sex, and Stuff’s live Valentine’s Day Call-in show.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: GrahamOfLegend, David Meintel, Trent Berrie, Black Jack, Luiz Aguiar (@8bitLuiz), James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), &The Nano Biologist
The Roper Report   -
00:12:40 - Will Anthem Survive the Week? Jason @ Bloomberg
00:25:40 - CD Projekt HACKED
00:33:03 - Crash 4 Comes to Next-Gen
00:39:29 -  Ad
00:42:30 - Persona Strikers Review Round-Up
00:46:50 - Ubi Call Quick Hits, Daniel Ahmad on Twitter
00:56:02 - QUICK HITS!
00:57:50 - Out today
